greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n read modulo (number of divisors of n).
comment: a(n)=0 iff n is a refactorable number (cf. A033950). - _Franz Vrabec_, Oct 16 2005
a(n) = A049850(n) mod A000005(n). - _Jaroslav Krizek_, Nov 27 2013
a(A066708(n)) = n and a(m) < n for m < A066708(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := Mod[n, DivisorSigma[0, n]]; Array[a, 105] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 19 2017 *)
program: a054008 n = n `mod` a000005 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 12 2000
